Query:
SELECT 
    				t.DisplayName, 
    				count(*) ,
    				decode(s.status, 4, 'Success', 5 , 'Failed' ),
    				sum(s.transactionamount) as Amount, 
    				Concat(to_char(s.CreateTime,'YYYY '), to_char(s.CreateTime, 'MONTH')) 
				FROM 
					service_charge_txn_log s, 
					transaction_type t
				WHERE
					s.TransactiontypeID = t.ID
					and (s.CreateTime between ${StartTime} and ${EndTime})
				GROUP BY
					t.DisplayName, to_char(s.CreateTime, 'YYYY '),
					to_char(s.CreateTime, 'MONTH'), s.TransactiontypeID , s.status
				order by t.DisplayName;
